mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McAbee, Harry M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Jany 21 1862. By Telegraph from Patterson Creek 1862. Asst Surgeon Evoeks is sick can you supply a medical officer to report here immediately in his stead there are also two full Virginia batteries here that should also be supplied with a medical officer HM McAbee Medical Director 37z148pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McAbee, Harry M.
Patterson Creek, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
